name: Next Door Learning Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
description: Provider of an online test preparation platform designed to help students to prepare for competitive exams. The company's platform delivers educational content and mock tests for job aspirants preparing for SSC, GATE, railways, IAS or bank examinations in India, enabling students to excel in their career.
